channel.title: How to?
channel.description: How do i add a command to IPban someone?

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Uhh something along the lines of:

if(command.startsWith(“ipban”)) {
String victim = command.substrimg(6);
appendToBannedIP(victim)
}

Idk, I’ve never used those kinds of commands.

Read full topic

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @dunea dunea
item.description:
@dunea wrote:

could i get a code to put in?

i have the ban one

[code] }
if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }[/code]

do i just do the same but change the bans to ipban?

Read full topic

Make a command that writes the victim’s IP to the ipbannedusers.txt
